Style/MethodDefParentheses.description:
Description

Checks if the method definitions have or don't have parentheses.
Style/MethodDefParentheses.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: require_parentheses (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['require_parentheses', 'require_no_parentheses', 'require_no_parentheses_except_multiline'] (type: list)
